metadata.title: CVE-2018-14424 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The daemon in GDM through 3.29.1 does not properly unexport display objectsfrom its D-Bus interface when they are destroyed, which allows a localattacker to trigger a use-after-free via a specially crafted sequence ofD-Bus method calls, resulting in a denial of service or potential codeexecution.

criterions.comment: gdm3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
